AmountInTransit.name: AmountInTransit
AmountInTransit.description: Amount in transit - The amount that you have requested your bank to pay

ApprovalStatus.name: ApprovalStatus
ApprovalStatus.description:
Approval status:
						null - Invoice was entered before approval functionality was activated (treated as Approved for payments)
						1 - N/A (used for non-electronic payment methods)
						2 - Awaiting review
						3 - Awaiting approval
						4 - Approved

DueDate.name: DueDate
DueDate.description: Date the invoice is due (This due date is not the discount due date)

EntryNumber.name: EntryNumber
EntryNumber.description: The entry number of this payment term corresponding purchase/cashflow entry

InvoiceDate.name: InvoiceDate
InvoiceDate.description: The date of the invoice or the date when money is paid to the supplier

InvoiceNumber.name: InvoiceNumber
InvoiceNumber.description: For purchase entry, it would be the entrynumber. For the cashflow entry, it will be entrynumber of an invoice which this payment is for

YourRef.name: YourRef
YourRef.description: Purchase invoice Your Reference number. Will be null if it is a cashflow entry

endpoint_info.good_to_know: Use this endpoint to get all your suppliers payment terms information. Payment term are created when an purchase invoice is created or when money is paid to the supplier.You can view this information in the Outstanding items report as well.
